resources.string:
Athens, Greece is a city that is often attributed as being the birthplace of western civilization! There are plenty of famous ancient ruins to visit, including The Acropolis, The Parthenon, and many others. The museums in Athens feature exhibits that represent the arts and culture of ancient and modern Greece.


Furthermore, the food in Greece is a reason to go! Our favorites include moussaka, souvlaki, and the amazing assortments of street food and family faire!

Berlin has been a hub of European history since the Prussian Empire. Berlin is full of landmarks to visit, including the Brandenburg Gate, the Reichstag building, the remnants of the Berlin Wall, and numerous museums, parks and other scenic attractions!\n\n

Cairo in Egypt is one of the most famous cities in the world. The Pyramids of Giza are perhaps Cairo\'s biggest attraction. There are numerous archaeological sites, museums, and cultural attractions, including the Egyptian Museum.\n\n

Delhi is full of cultural attractions and history. When in Delhi, be sure to visit the Red Fort, the Jama Masjid, and Humayun\'s Tomb. There are many museums and parks to see, including the National Museum and Akshardham Temple.\n\n
